question: Which Indian shooter has won gold in the women's 10m air pistol event at the International Shooting Competitions of Hannover in Germany?
explanation: Indian Shooter Heena Sidhu clinched the gold medal while compatriot P Shri Nivetha settled for bronze in the women\'s 10m air pistol event at the International Shooting Competitions of Hannover, Germany. Heena was in a rollicking form in the final where she was tied with France\'s Mathilde Lamolle on 239.8 points. She won the tie to win the gold ahead of Mathilde. Shri Nivetha finished on 219.2. The finish marks a strong build-up to next week\'s ISSF World Cup in Munich.
